task.title: How to subtract numbers
task.shortdesc: Here you will find instructions to use the subtration feature of the JPS Calculator Application.

taskbody.prereq: Before you begin, you must understand the concept of subtraction.
taskbody.result: The result of the subtraction is displayed in the calculator.

example.p: You want to subtract 2 from 3. The equation will look like: 3-2=1. You enter 3. Press minus. Enter 2. Press equals.
The result 1 appears on the screen.
